dotnet   Tune in for .NET Conf 2021 and the launch of.NET 6! https://www.dotnetconf.net
 Day 1 - November 9: Day one is all about the big news, .NET 6! Join the .NET team on all the new things you can do with the latest release. Day 2 - November 10: Day two is where we dive deeper into all the things you can do with .NET and our 24 hour broadcast begins with community speakers around the world. Day 3 - November 11: Day three continues our all day and night broadcast with speakers around the world in their own time zones.     Announcing .NET 6 Release Candidate 2:
 C# 10 Record structs Global usings File-scoped namespace declaration const and interpolated strings Extended property patterns .NET SDK: C# project templates modernized Console template Web templates Windows Forms templates Implicit usings Nullable string() args Defining regular methods macOS and Windows Arm64 Update    Read more: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-6-release-candidate-2/  ASP.NET Core updates in .NET 6 Release Candidate 2:  Native dependencies support for Blazor WebAssembly apps Using native code from a Blazor WebAssembly app Using libraries with native dependencies Minimal API updates OpenAPI Source Code Analysis Breaking Changes [APIs Renames]    Read more: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/aspnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-net-6-rc-2/   New LINQ methods in .NET 6: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0VwTzQ2gUQ
 MinBy method Maxby method Chunk method     EF core 6.0 includes support for SQL server temporal tables: https://jaliyaudagedara.blogspot.com/2021/10/ef-core-60-introducing-support-for-sql.html   .NET MAUI  Announcing .NET MAUI Preview 9 is aviable with .NET RC2 and in the preview channel of Visual Studio 2022 Preview 5:  Updated Controls Borders, Corners, and Shadows – Oh my! Quick Android Startup Ecosystem Controls    Read more: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-net-maui-preview-9/ Kubernetes    KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2021: During last week we could enjoy KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2021. All events was record and will be available next month in the CNCF YouTube channel. You can check all sessions here: https://events.linuxfoundation.org/kubecon-cloudnativecon-north-america/program/schedule/   Learn how to easily setup your Kubernetes limits and requests https://sysdig.com/blog/kubernetes-limits-requests/   Dapr release 1.4.3: https://github.com/dapr/dapr/releases/tag/v1.4.3
 Fixes: Problem Subscription v1alpha1 applied in v2alpha1 (#3731)     Helm release 3.7.1: https://github.com/helm/helm/releases/tag/v3.7.1
 What’s next:  3.6.4 will contain only bug fixes and is planned for release on November 10, 2021. 3.8.0 is the next feature release and will be released on January 12, 2022.   Changelog  Bump github.com/containerd/containerd from 1.5.4 to 1.5.7 1d11fcb (dependabot[bot]) changes to support any mediatype for layers on download 52fbd4e (LochanRn) docs: fix typo Charts.yaml 2aacc5f (Alexey Igrychev) actually skip unverifiable files 96cdab4 (Fabian Jucker) Fix default registry config path of oci protocol provider 57ecc25 (Kai Takac)       Others  Javi Santana - Co-founder @Tinybirdco, ex @CARTO CTO has been working with data for 20+ years, he is sharing 40 things that he learned about data. You can follow them in this post: https://javisantana.com/fastdata/40-things-I-learned-about-data.html He empezado a recopilar las 40 cosas que he aprendido en estos años sobre datos. Iré poniendo una por día
